statusLine.command: jq -r '"\(.model.display_name // "unknown")  |  \(.workspace.project_dir // "--" | split("/") | last)  |  \(.workspace.current_dir // .cwd // "--" | split("/") | last)  |  \(.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0 | . / 1000 * 10 | floor / 10 | tostring + "k") tokens  |  \(.context_window.used_percentage // 0 | round)% used"'
